title: Roxana Fiorella Guillen Hurtado
text:
Roxana Fiorella Guillen Hurtado



Hello world, and welcome to my portfolio!
I am Fiorella Guillen, a postgraduate student in Urban Spatial Science at UCL with a background in architecture and urbanism. I have a strong interest in sustainable urban development and spatial analysis, and I’m passionate about leveraging data-driven solutions to tackle urban challenges.
Here, you’ll find insights into my work and academic projects, including spatial data analysis, and my past experience in urban planning.
Feel free to explore my projects, and don’t hesitate to reach out!







Have a quick look at some of my projects!

title: 4  Let’s connect! 📩
text:
If you would like to collaborate or discuss urban research, feel free to reach out!
📧 Email: guillen.fiorella@outlook.com
💻 GitHub: github.com/fiorellaguillenh
🔗 LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/fiorellaguillen

title: 1  About Me 🌍
text:
1.0.1 🎓 Education
I am a postgraduate student in Urban Spatial Science at The Bartlett, UCL, with a background in architecture and urbanism. My academic and professional journey has allowed me to develop expertise in geospatial analysis, urban planning, and sustainable mobility solutions.
My work combines data science, GIS, and urban design to improve decision-making in cities. I have experience in urban analysis, transport planning, and climate adaptation research.

title: 2  Skills & Expertise 🛠️
text: 2.1 Programming & Data Science

title: 2  Skills & Expertise 🛠️
text:

text:

Spatial Network Analysis, Agent-Based Modeling
Urban Simulation & Remote Sensing

title: 2  Skills & Expertise 🛠️
text:
2.3 Data Visualization & Design

ggplot2, Matplotlib, Bokeh, Leaflet
AutoCAD, Rhinoceros, Grasshopper (Parametric Design)
Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign)

title: 2  Academic Projects 🏗️
text: 2.1 Identification of associations between socio-economic factors and dwelling fires in London in 2021

title: 3  Academic Projects 🏗️
text:
Developed an alternative urban model for flood-prone communities.
Applied geospatial analysis to identify resettlement areas.
Presented at academic events in Peru and Spain.

title: 3  Academic Projects 🏗️
section: 3.2 🚇 Transport Network Analysis for Sustainable Mobility
text:
3.2 🚇 Transport Network Analysis for Sustainable Mobility

Evaluated public transport accessibility using NetworkX.
Proposed policy recommendations for non-motorized mobility.
Integrated GIS and spatial modeling techniques.

title: 3  Academic Projects 🏗️
text:
3.3 📡 Remote Sensing for Climate Adaptation

Utilized Google Earth Engine to analyze land-use changes.
Designed an early warning system for vulnerable settlements.
Worked on research collaboration between PUCP and UCL.

title: 3  Work Experience 💼
text: 3.1 Urban Designer | Municipality of Lima (2021-2024)

title: 3  Work Experience 💼
text:
Led public space design, integrating sustainable mobility.
Developed urban policies to improve accessibility.
Coordinated with local authorities for project implementation.

title: 3  Work Experience 💼
text:
3.2 Student Ambassador | The Bartlett, UCL (2024-Present)

Representing MSc Urban Spatial Science at outreach events.
Supporting student engagement and academic mentoring.

title: 3  Work Experience 💼
text:
3.3 Research Intern | Climate Resettlement Project (2018)

Assisted in urban planning research for Amazonian resettlements.
Designed visual materials for research publications.
